credit_line: Gift of Susan W. Paine in Memory of Stephen D. Paine, Class of 1954, and in Honor of Linda B. Shearer and her years as Director of the Williams College Museum of Art
title: Peppermint Suckers
inscriptions: l.c. signed in oil: Thiebaud 1962; verso u.l. typed on label [Allan Stone, NY, label]; u.r. in ink: Peppermint Suckers 1962/ 11 x 14 oil; verso u.r. stamped in ink: [artist's name and address]; verso c.r. signed in ink over white paint: Thiebaud/ 1962; verso l.l. typed on label: [Paine Collection label]; l.r. on label: [Van's Art Shop label]
